trans-unit.source: This class contains the LINQ to XML extension methods for XSD validation.
trans-unit.target: 此类包含用于进行 XSD 验证的 LINQ to XML 扩展方法。

trans-unit.source: This class also contains methods to get the post-schema-validation infoset (PSVI) of a validated XML node.
trans-unit.target: 此类还包含方法来获取已验证的 XML 节点的架构验证信息集 (PSVI)。

trans-unit.source: When you validate an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument>, <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>, or <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute>, you can also optionally populate the XML tree with the post-schema-validation infoset.
trans-unit.target: 当验证<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument>， <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>，或<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute>，你也可以填充用架构验证后信息集的 XML 树。

trans-unit.source: PSVI information is added as an annotation of type <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 作为类型的批注添加 PSVI 信息<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The XSD in [Sample XSD File: Customers and Orders](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8b05efe3-cc5e-4c7b-b322-892dbda41687) contains a schema that can be used to validate the XML document in [Sample XML File: Customers and Orders (LINQ to XML)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/26790c41-5976-4558-a096-d0f67bfc4d92).
trans-unit.target: 在 XSD[示例 XSD 文件： 客户和订单](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8b05efe3-cc5e-4c7b-b322-892dbda41687)包含可以用于验证中的 XML 文档的架构[示例 XML 文件： 客户和订单 (LINQ to XML)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/26790c41-5976-4558-a096-d0f67bfc4d92)。

trans-unit.source: The following example loads the schema and the document, validates the document, changes the document so that the `xs:key` and `xs:keyref` relationship is not valid, and then attempts to validate again.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例加载的架构和文档，验证文档，更改该文档以便`xs:key`和`xs:keyref`关系无效，，然后尝试再次验证。

trans-unit.source: This example produces the following output:
trans-unit.target: 该示例产生下面的输出：

trans-unit.source: Gets the post-schema-validation infoset (PSVI) of a validated node.
trans-unit.target: 获取已验证节点的架构验证后信息集 (PSVI)。

trans-unit.source: After you have validated an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument>, you can retrieve the post-schema-validation infoset for an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement> or <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute> that is contained in the document.
trans-unit.target: 验证后<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument>，你可以检索有关的架构验证信息集<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>或<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute>包含文档中。

trans-unit.source: After retrieving the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo> object, you can use the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo.SchemaAttribute%2A> or <xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo.SchemaElement%2A> properties to get a partial validation type (<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement> or <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute>).
trans-unit.target: 在检索后<xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo>对象时，可以使用<xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo.SchemaAttribute%2A>或<xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo.SchemaElement%2A>属性以获取部分验证类型 (<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement>或<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute>)。

trans-unit.source: You can use the partial validation types to validate an attribute or a sub-tree.
trans-unit.target: 部分验证类型可用于验证属性或子树。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute" /> that has been previously validated.
trans-unit.target: 一个之前已经验证过的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the post-schema-validation infoset (PSVI) of a validated attribute.
trans-unit.target: 获取已验证特性的架构验证后信息集 (PSVI)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo" /> that contains the post-schema-validation infoset for an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo" />，它包含 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute" /> 的架构验证后信息集。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo> returned by this method to determine certain characteristics of a validated attribute.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo>返回此方法来确定验证的属性的某些特征。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can determine if the attribute came from a default attribute value in an XSD.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以确定属性是否来自 XSD 中的默认属性值。

trans-unit.source: You use the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo.SchemaAttribute%2A> property to get a partial validation type (<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute>).
trans-unit.target: 你使用<xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo.SchemaAttribute%2A>属性来获取部分验证类型 (<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute>)。

trans-unit.source: You can use it to revalidate an attribute without validating an entire document.
trans-unit.target: 可用于重新验证某个属性，而无需验证整个文档。

trans-unit.source: For an example of this property, see <xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.Validate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的示例，请参阅<xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.Validate%2A>。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" /> that has been previously validated.
trans-unit.target: 一个之前已经验证过的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the post-schema-validation infoset (PSVI) of a validated element.
trans-unit.target: 获取已验证元素的架构验证后信息集 (PSVI)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo" /> that contains the post-schema-validation infoset (PSVI) for an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo" />，它包含 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" /> 的架构验证后信息集 (PSVI)。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo> returned by this method to determine certain characteristics of a validated element.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo>返回此方法以确定已验证元素的某些特征。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can determine the dynamic schema type of the element.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以确定元素的动态架构类型。

trans-unit.source: You use the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo.SchemaElement%2A> property to get a partial validation type (<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement>).
trans-unit.target: 你使用<xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo.SchemaElement%2A>属性来获取部分验证类型 (<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement>)。

trans-unit.source: You can use it to revalidate a sub-tree with an element at its root without validating an entire document.
trans-unit.target: 可用于重新具有其根处的元素的子树验证而无需验证整个文档。

trans-unit.source: For an example of this property, see <xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.Validate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的示例，请参阅<xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.Validate%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example populates the tree with a PSVI.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例填充具有 PSVI 的树。

trans-unit.source: After validation, it prints all elements and attributes in the tree that are invalid according to the PSVI.
trans-unit.target: 验证之后，它将所有元素和属性在树中，根据 PSVI 无效。

trans-unit.source: This example produces the following output:
trans-unit.target: 该示例产生下面的输出：

trans-unit.source: Validates that an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument" />, an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" />, or an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute" /> conforms to an XSD in an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />.
trans-unit.target: 验证 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument" />、<see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute" /> 是否与 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" /> 中的 XSD 相符。

trans-unit.source: These methods use an underlying <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> to validate the XML tree against an XSD.
trans-unit.target: 这些方法使用基础<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>验证针对 XSD XML 树。

trans-unit.source: Validation error and warning messages are handled using the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: 验证错误和警告消息使用处理<xref:System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler>委托。

trans-unit.source: If no event handler is provided to these methods, validation errors are exposed as an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有事件处理程序提供给这些方法，将验证错误公开为<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationException>。

trans-unit.source: Validation warnings do not cause an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationException> to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 验证警告不会导致<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationException>引发。

trans-unit.source: Some of these extension methods optionally allow population of the post-schema-validation infoset (PSVI).
trans-unit.target: 这些扩展方法的一些可以选择允许架构验证信息集 (PSVI) 的填充。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument" /> to validate.
trans-unit.target: 要验证的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" /> to validate against.
trans-unit.target: 一个作为验证依据的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler" /> for an event that occurs when the reader encounters validation errors.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler" />，可用于处理当读取器遇到验证错误时所发生的事件。

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="null" />, throws an exception upon validation errors.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="null" />，将在验证错误时引发异常。

trans-unit.source: This method validates that an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument" /> conforms to an XSD in an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />.
trans-unit.target: 此方法验证 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument" /> 是否与 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" /> 中的 XSD 相符。

trans-unit.source: This extension method validates that the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument> conforms to the schema content model in <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>.
trans-unit.target: 此扩展方法验证<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument>符合的架构内容模型中<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>, then validates two <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument> objects against the schema set.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建一个 <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>，然后针对架构集验证两个 <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument> 对象。

trans-unit.source: One of the documents is valid, the other is not.
trans-unit.target: 其中一个文档为有效文档，而另一个则不是。

trans-unit.source: This example produces the following output:
trans-unit.target: 该示例产生下面的输出：

trans-unit.source: Thrown for XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) validation errors.
trans-unit.target: 出现 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 验证错误时引发。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute" /> to validate.
trans-unit.target: 要验证的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject" /> that specifies the sub-tree to validate.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject" />，指定要验证的子树。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" /> to validate against.
trans-unit.target: 一个作为验证依据的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler" /> for an event that occurs when the reader encounters validation errors.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler" />，可用于处理当读取器遇到验证错误时所发生的事件。

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="null" />, throws an exception upon validation errors.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="null" />，将在验证错误时引发异常。

trans-unit.source: This method validates that an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute" /> conforms to a specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject" /> and an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />.
trans-unit.target: 此方法验证 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute" /> 是否与指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" /> 相符。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to validate that an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute> conforms to a schema.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此方法以验证<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute>符合架构。

trans-unit.source: You typically use this method when you have modified an attribute, and you want to make sure that it still conforms to its schema.
trans-unit.target: 通常，当您修改了属性，并且你想要确保它仍然其架构相符，可使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: You could validate the entire document, but it takes less processing time to validate just the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 无法验证整个文档，但是它将只验证该属性缩短处理时间。

trans-unit.source: If you pass `null` for `validationEventHandler`, this method raises an exception upon validation errors.
trans-unit.target: 如果你通过`null`为`validationEventHandler`，此方法将引发异常时验证错误。

trans-unit.source: Validation warnings will not raise an exception.
trans-unit.target: 验证警告不会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: To validate an attribute, you use an instance of <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>.
trans-unit.target: 若要验证属性，你使用的实例<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>。

trans-unit.source: You can obtain this instance in various ways.
trans-unit.target: 你可以获取此实例以各种方式。

trans-unit.source: An easy way is as follows:
trans-unit.target: 简单方法是，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: Validate that a document conforms to a schema.
trans-unit.target: 验证文档符合架构。

trans-unit.source: Add the post-schema-validation infoset (PSVI) by calling the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.Validate%2A> extension method.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用添加的架构验证信息集 (PSVI)<xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.Validate%2A>扩展方法。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A> extension method to retrieve an object that implements <xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo>.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A>扩展方法来检索实现的对象<xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo>。

trans-unit.source: From the retrieved object, you can get an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>.
trans-unit.target: 从所检索到的对象，你可以获取<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>。

trans-unit.source: If you get an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject> for an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>, the type will be <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你收到<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>为<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>，则类型将是<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement>。

trans-unit.source: If you get an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject> for an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute>, the type will be <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你收到<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>为<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute>，则类型将是<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: After you have an instance of an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>, you can use this method to validate an attribute.
trans-unit.target: 实例后<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>，你可以使用此方法来验证属性。

trans-unit.source: This example produces the following output:
trans-unit.target: 该示例产生下面的输出：

trans-unit.source: Thrown for XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) validation errors.
trans-unit.target: 出现 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 验证错误时引发。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument" /> to validate.
trans-unit.target: 要验证的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" /> to validate against.
trans-unit.target: 一个作为验证依据的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler" /> for an event that occurs when the reader encounters validation errors.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler" />，可用于处理当读取器遇到验证错误时所发生的事件。

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="null" />, throws an exception upon validation errors.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="null" />，将在验证错误时引发异常。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> indicating whether to populate the post-schema-validation infoset (PSVI).
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />，指示是否填充架构验证后信息集 (PSVI)。

trans-unit.source: Validates that an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument" /> conforms to an XSD in an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />, optionally populating the XML tree with the post-schema-validation infoset (PSVI).
trans-unit.target: 验证 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument" /> 是否与 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" /> 中的某个 XSD 相符，并且可以选择使用架构验证后信息集 (PSVI) 填充 XML 树。

trans-unit.source: This extension method validates that the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument> conforms to the schema content model in <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>.
trans-unit.target: 此扩展方法验证<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument>符合的架构内容模型中<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>。

trans-unit.source: If `addSchemaInfo` is `true`, this method populates the XML tree with the post-schema-validation infoset (PSVI).
trans-unit.target: 如果`addSchemaInfo`是`true`，此方法使用填充 XML 树的架构验证信息集 (PSVI)。

trans-unit.source: There are two steps to populating the XML tree with the PSVI.
trans-unit.target: 有两个步骤填充具有 PSVI 的 XML 树。

trans-unit.source: First, an annotation is added to all nodes in the tree to enable you to call <xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> on an element or attribute in the tree.
trans-unit.target: 首先，将批注添加到工作树，以使您能够调用中的所有节点<xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>元素或在树中的属性。

trans-unit.source: Second, default elements and attributes defined in the XSD are added to the XML tree.
trans-unit.target: 其次，将默认元素和 XSD 中定义的属性添加到 XML 树中。

trans-unit.source: By calling one of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A> methods, you can determine if a specific element or attribute was added from the XSD as a default element or attribute.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用之一<xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A>方法，你可以决定是否将特定元素或属性已添加从 XSD 作为默认元素或属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example contains an XSD that defines the `Child2` element with an `Att1` attribute with a default value.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例包含 XSD 定义`Child2`具有元素`Att1`带默认值的属性。

trans-unit.source: After successfully validating the document, the attribute with the default value is added to the XML tree.
trans-unit.target: 已成功验证文档之后, 具有默认值的属性将被添加到 XML 树。

trans-unit.source: Note that the default attribute is not added to `doc2`, which does not validate against the schema.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，默认属性不是添加到`doc2`，这不会针对架构验证。

trans-unit.source: This example produces the following output:
trans-unit.target: 该示例产生下面的输出：

trans-unit.source: The following example populates the tree with PSVI.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例填充具有 PSVI 的树。

trans-unit.source: After validation, it prints all elements and attributes in the tree that are invalid according to the PSVI.
trans-unit.target: 验证之后，它将所有元素和属性在树中，根据 PSVI 无效。

trans-unit.source: This example produces the following output:
trans-unit.target: 该示例产生下面的输出：

trans-unit.source: Thrown for XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) validation errors.
trans-unit.target: 出现 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 验证错误时引发。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" /> to validate.
trans-unit.target: 要验证的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject" /> that specifies the sub-tree to validate.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject" />，指定要验证的子树。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" /> to validate against.
trans-unit.target: 一个作为验证依据的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler" /> for an event that occurs when the reader encounters validation errors.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler" />，可用于处理当读取器遇到验证错误时所发生的事件。

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="null" />, throws an exception upon validation errors.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="null" />，将在验证错误时引发异常。

trans-unit.source: This method validates that an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" /> sub-tree conforms to a specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject" /> and an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />.
trans-unit.target: 此方法验证 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" /> 子树是否与指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" /> 相符。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to validate that a sub-tree (with an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement> at its root) conforms to a schema.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此方法验证子树 (与<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>其根部) 符合架构。

trans-unit.source: You typically use this method when you have modified a sub-tree, and you want to make sure that it still conforms to its schema.
trans-unit.target: 通常，当您修改了子树中，并且你想要确保它仍然其架构相符，可使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: You could validate the entire document, but it takes less processing time to validate a just a sub-tree.
trans-unit.target: 无法验证整个文档，但是它将只验证缩短处理时间子树。

trans-unit.source: If you pass `null` for `validationEventHandler`, then this method raises an exception upon validation errors.
trans-unit.target: 如果你通过`null`为`validationEventHandler`，则此方法将引发异常时验证错误。

trans-unit.source: Validation warnings will not raise an exception.
trans-unit.target: 验证警告不会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: To validate a sub-tree, you use an instance of <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>.
trans-unit.target: 若要验证子树，你使用的实例<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>。

trans-unit.source: You can obtain this instance in various ways.
trans-unit.target: 你可以获取此实例以各种方式。

trans-unit.source: An easy way is as follows:
trans-unit.target: 简单方法是，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: Validate that a document conforms to a schema.
trans-unit.target: 验证文档符合架构。

trans-unit.source: Add the post-schema-validation infoset (PSVI) by calling the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.Validate%2A> extension method.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用添加的架构验证信息集 (PSVI)<xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.Validate%2A>扩展方法。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A> extension method to retrieve an object that implements <xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo>.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A>扩展方法来检索实现的对象<xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo>。

trans-unit.source: From the retrieved object, you can get an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>.
trans-unit.target: 从所检索到的对象，你可以获取<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>。

trans-unit.source: If you get an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject> for an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>, the type will be <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你收到<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>为<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>，则类型将是<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement>。

trans-unit.source: If you get an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject> for an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute>, the type will be <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你收到<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>为<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute>，则类型将是<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: After you have an instance of an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>, you can use this method to validate an sub-tree.
trans-unit.target: 实例后<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>，你可以使用此方法验证子树。

trans-unit.source: This example produces the following output:
trans-unit.target: 该示例产生下面的输出：

trans-unit.source: Thrown for XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) validation errors.
trans-unit.target: 出现 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 验证错误时引发。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute" /> to validate.
trans-unit.target: 要验证的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject" /> that specifies the sub-tree to validate.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject" />，指定要验证的子树。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" /> to validate against.
trans-unit.target: 一个作为验证依据的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler" /> for an event that occurs when the reader encounters validation errors.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler" />，可用于处理当读取器遇到验证错误时所发生的事件。

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="null" />, throws an exception upon validation errors.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="null" />，将在验证错误时引发异常。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> indicating whether to populate the post-schema-validation infoset (PSVI).
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />，指示是否填充架构验证后信息集 (PSVI)。

trans-unit.source: Validates that an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute" /> conforms to a specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject" /> and an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />, optionally populating the XML tree with the post-schema-validation infoset (PSVI).
trans-unit.target: 验证 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute" /> 是否与指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" /> 相符，并且可以选择使用架构验证后信息集 (PSVI) 填充 XML 树。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to validate that an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute> conforms to a schema.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此方法以验证<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute>符合架构。

trans-unit.source: You typically use this method when you have modified an attribute, and you want to make sure that it still conforms to its schema.
trans-unit.target: 通常，当您修改了属性，并且你想要确保它仍然其架构相符，可使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: You could validate the entire document, but it takes less processing time to validate just the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 无法验证整个文档，但是它将只验证该属性缩短处理时间。

trans-unit.source: If `addSchemaInfo` is `true`, this method populates the attribute with the post-schema-validation infoset (PSVI).
trans-unit.target: 如果`addSchemaInfo`是`true`，此方法填充具有架构验证信息集 (PSVI) 的属性。

trans-unit.source: After you have populated the XML tree with the PSVI, you can call <xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> on the validated attribute.
trans-unit.target: 已填充具有 PSVI 的 XML 树之后，你可以调用<xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>上验证的属性。

trans-unit.source: This is useful if you are writing code that relies on data returned by <xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你正在编写依赖于返回数据的代码这很有用<xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If you pass `null` for `validationEventHandler`, then this method raises an exception upon validation errors.
trans-unit.target: 如果你通过`null`为`validationEventHandler`，则此方法将引发异常时验证错误。

trans-unit.source: Validation warnings will not raise an exception.
trans-unit.target: 验证警告不会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: To validate an attribute, you use an instance of <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>.
trans-unit.target: 若要验证属性，你使用的实例<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>。

trans-unit.source: You can obtain this instance in various ways.
trans-unit.target: 你可以获取此实例以各种方式。

trans-unit.source: An easy way is as follows:
trans-unit.target: 简单方法是，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: Validate that a document conforms to a schema.
trans-unit.target: 验证文档符合架构。

trans-unit.source: Add the post-schema-validation infoset (PSVI) by calling the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.Validate%2A> extension method.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用添加的架构验证信息集 (PSVI)<xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.Validate%2A>扩展方法。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A> extension method to retrieve an object that implements <xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo>.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A>扩展方法来检索实现的对象<xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo>。

trans-unit.source: From the retrieved object, you can get an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>.
trans-unit.target: 从所检索到的对象，你可以获取<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>。

trans-unit.source: If you get an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject> for an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>, the type will be <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你收到<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>为<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>，则类型将是<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement>。

trans-unit.source: If you get an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject> for an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute>, the type will be <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你收到<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>为<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute>，则类型将是<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: After you have an instance of an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>, you can use this method to validate an attribute.
trans-unit.target: 实例后<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>，你可以使用此方法来验证属性。

trans-unit.source: This example produces the following output:
trans-unit.target: 该示例产生下面的输出：

trans-unit.source: Thrown for XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) validation errors.
trans-unit.target: 出现 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 验证错误时引发。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" /> to validate.
trans-unit.target: 要验证的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject" /> that specifies the sub-tree to validate.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject" />，指定要验证的子树。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" /> to validate against.
trans-unit.target: 一个作为验证依据的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler" /> for an event that occurs when the reader encounters validation errors.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler" />，可用于处理当读取器遇到验证错误时所发生的事件。

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="null" />, throws an exception upon validation errors.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="null" />，将在验证错误时引发异常。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> indicating whether to populate the post-schema-validation infoset (PSVI).
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />，指示是否填充架构验证后信息集 (PSVI)。

trans-unit.source: Validates that an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" /> sub-tree conforms to a specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject" /> and an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />, optionally populating the XML tree with the post-schema-validation infoset (PSVI).
trans-unit.target: 验证 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" /> 子树是否与指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" /> 相符，并且可以选择使用架构验证后信息集 (PSVI) 填充 XML 树。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to validate that a sub-tree (with an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement> at the root of the sub-tree) conforms to a schema.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此方法验证子树 (与<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>根目录下的子树) 符合架构。

trans-unit.source: You typically use this method when you have modified a sub-tree, and you want to make sure that it still conforms to its schema.
trans-unit.target: 通常，当您修改了子树中，并且你想要确保它仍然其架构相符，可使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: You could validate the entire document, but it takes less processing time to validate a just a sub-tree.
trans-unit.target: 无法验证整个文档，但是它将只验证缩短处理时间子树。

trans-unit.source: If `addSchemaInfo` is `true`, then this method populates the XML tree with the post-schema-validation infoset (PSVI).
trans-unit.target: 如果`addSchemaInfo`是`true`，则此方法使用填充 XML 树的架构验证信息集 (PSVI)。

trans-unit.source: There are two aspects of populating the XML tree with the PSVI.
trans-unit.target: 有两个方面的填充具有 PSVI 的 XML 树。

trans-unit.source: First, an annotation is added to all nodes in the tree such that you can now call <xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A> on an element or attribute in the tree.
trans-unit.target: 首先，批注添加到树中的所有节点以便现在，您可以调用<xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A>元素或在树中的属性。

trans-unit.source: Second, default elements and attributes defined in the XSD are added to the XML tree.
trans-unit.target: 其次，将默认元素和 XSD 中定义的属性添加到 XML 树中。

trans-unit.source: By calling one of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A> methods, you can determine if a specific element or attribute was added from the XSD as a default element or attribute.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用之一<xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A>方法，你可以决定是否将特定元素或属性已添加从 XSD 作为默认元素或属性。

trans-unit.source: If you pass `null` for `validationEventHandler`, then this method raises an exception upon validation errors.
trans-unit.target: 如果你通过`null`为`validationEventHandler`，则此方法将引发异常时验证错误。

trans-unit.source: Validation warnings will not raise an exception.
trans-unit.target: 验证警告不会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: To validate a sub-tree, you use an instance of <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>.
trans-unit.target: 若要验证子树，你使用的实例<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>。

trans-unit.source: You can obtain this instance in various ways.
trans-unit.target: 你可以获取此实例以各种方式。

trans-unit.source: An easy way is as follows:
trans-unit.target: 简单方法是，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: Validate that a document conforms to a schema.
trans-unit.target: 验证文档符合架构。

trans-unit.source: Add the post-schema-validation infoset (PSVI) by calling the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.Validate%2A> extension method.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用添加的架构验证信息集 (PSVI)<xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.Validate%2A>扩展方法。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A> extension method to retrieve an object that implements <xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo>.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Xml.Schema.Extensions.GetSchemaInfo%2A>扩展方法来检索实现的对象<xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo>。

trans-unit.source: From the retrieved object, you can get an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>.
trans-unit.target: 从所检索到的对象，你可以获取<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>。

trans-unit.source: If you get an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject> for an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>, the type will be <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你收到<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>为<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>，则类型将是<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement>。

trans-unit.source: If you get an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject> for an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute>, the type will be <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你收到<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>为<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute>，则类型将是<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: After you have an instance of an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>, you can use this method to validate a sub-tree..
trans-unit.target: 实例后<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject>，你可以使用此方法验证子树...

trans-unit.source: This example produces the following output:
trans-unit.target: 该示例产生下面的输出：

trans-unit.source: Thrown for XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) validation errors.
trans-unit.target: 出现 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 验证错误时引发。
